ja64:1.1: When a wife has been good, she expects her husband to be nice to her; but when she has been bad, she is nice to him. These complex behaviors confuse her husband, so he is advised to simply ignore her feelings.
ja64:1.3: _Thīnaṁ_ is genitive plural, glossed _itthīnaṁ_. | The Dhamma is also “hardto understand” ([snp3.12:59.1]()).
